scripts.deploy:dev: node .require-node-10.js && yarn workspaces run build && firebase deploy --force -P reach4help-dev
scripts.deploy:try-out-change: node .require-node-10.js && yarn workspaces run build && firebase --force deploy -P reach4help-try-out-change
scripts.deploy:staging: node .require-node-10.js && yarn workspaces run build && firebase deploy --force -P reach4help-staging
scripts.deploy:prod: node .require-node-10.js && yarn workspaces run build && firebase deploy -P reach4help
